duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with oversight of player and caddie experience for golf tournaments
Manage day-to-day office administration and systems for the Foundation
Coordinate and manage tournament office moves and technology setup
Provide administrative assistance to Player Relations Manager and CEO/Tournament Director
Deliver exceptional customer service to address all invitee questions, concerns, and issues immediately and with discretion
Assist with creation and distribution of event schedules, timelines, and run of show documents

education_certification.credential: Four-year degree or equivalent combination of education, training, and experience
